answers.answer: Walk around it helps. Of chill in The bathtub its what saved me. You got this
I'm in the hospital they got me on monitors n I went from a fingertip one to 3 in about 2 hrs before they even did nething

****. Hopefully you get a better nurse next switch. You can ask for some meds(Tylenol sometimes, may give you morphine always only a tiny bit) And still do a natural birth cause it wears off after 2hours completely after like 3. Ask them for something
That's if your going natural if not then ask for your epi or when you can get it
Got epi went from 3+ to 6 in a matter of half hr.

question: So been in the hospital since Monday for preeclampsia due to b induced tomorrow morning... Well I got woken up this morning at 5 a.m for blood work n could not go back to sleep... I was getting pain from my back to my hips to the front (contraction belt)...  Now I'm on monitors n lemme tell ya if this is only the beginning of the pain I'm gonna b one bitchy person unless they knock me out! Props to those who go natural.
title: owwie!!
